| HistoryText             = Black Mariah was the leader of a gang of New York criminals called the [[Rat Pack (Black Mariah's) (Earth-616)|Rat Pack]]. Their primary source of income involved using a stolen ambulance to pick up the bodies of the recently deceased and then stealing whatever valuables they had on their person.{{r|Avengers Origins: Luke Cage #1}}
